Title: Starbucks
Description: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.
Price: $1–10
Category: Coffee shop
Address: 225 S Main St, Akron, OH 44325
Phone: (330) 972-2113
Website: https://www.starbucks.com/store-locator/store/10333
Image URL: https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipN33bvG46SXZKsY8aEtl173Xbqhes0B0peLxUIb=w426-h240-k-no
Opening Hours:
  - Monday: 7:30 AM to 4 PM
  - Tuesday: 7:30 AM to 4 PM
  - Wednesday: 7:30 AM to 4 PM
  - Thursday: 7:30 AM to 4 PM
  - Friday: 7:30 AM to 2:30 PM
  - Saturday: Closed
  - Sunday: Closed
Tags: Coffee shop, Cafe, Coffee store, Espresso bar
Amenities: Restroom, Wi-Fi, Free Wi-Fi
Atmosphere: Casual, Trendy
Popular For: Breakfast, Solo dining, Good for working on laptop
Offerings: Coffee, Prepared foods, Quick bite, Small plates, Vegetarian options
Service Options: Drive-through, Takeout, Dine-in
Dining Options: Breakfast, Lunch, Dessert
Parking: Free parking lot
Accessibility: Wheelchair accessible entrance, Wheelchair accessible parking lot, Wheelchair accessible restroom, Wheelchair accessible seating
